awards.text: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 2 wins & 2 nominations.

fullplot: Survivors in the areas hardest hit by Japan's recent tsunami find the courage to revive and rebuild as cherry blossom season begins.
plot: Survivors in the areas hardest hit by Japan's recent tsunami find the courage to revive and rebuild as cherry blossom season begins.
title: The Tsunami and the Cherry Blossom
